snippet: With a new poll of Florida from Mason-Dixon, released on Saturday, showing Barack Obama with a nominal 1-percentage point lead there over Mitt Romney, the FiveThirtyEight model shows Florida as close as can be.
abstract: With a new poll of Florida from Mason-Dixon, released on Saturday, showing Barack Obama with a nominal 1-percentage point lead there over Mitt Romney, the FiveThirtyEight model shows Florida as close as can be.
